title: (x) Nylon magazine outline logo - redrawn Futura {J. Edward Sanchez}
content:
does anyone know any of the fonts that nylon magazine uses?  
i think for the cover they use arial black  
any others?

and this one too?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_5867.jpg)
author: lydiapark

comments.content: I knw that one, the Ns look different - right?

The <cite>blogs.</cite> text is [News Gothic SH Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233316/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/news-gothic-sh/bold-con/).

As for <cite>NYLON</cite>, it may be hand-drawn, but it can be approximated using something like a stroked [Futura Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233316/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/futura/extra-bold/) and Photoshop's Wave filter:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NYLON_3774.png)
